review: Extremely satisfied with surgery and post-operative care. My mother's anxiety levels were through the roof pre-surgery period. Having been through multiple hospitals and doctors, it was bound to happen too. But Dr.Khanna was reassuring, experienced and explained in detail beforehand what the expect, so we weren't feeling blindsided or shortchanged as far as information was concerned. The surgery went off well and it was the right decision to go ahead with the surgery at Wockhardt with Dr. Mudit Khanna. Highly recommend for all patients considering knee replacement surgeries.
very polite & giving all information properly.  making patient comfortable.  Also given alternative therapy information

Myself Sanika Sawant. My Total knee replacement surgery of both the legs done at the same time by Dr Mudit Khanna. The results were 100% satisfactory. He is  very aunderstanding and listens to your concern. Now I feel very comfortable and better then before. He guided us well, with his guidance we took the right decision. It was a wonderful and warm experience.
I highly recommend this Doctor
